participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and humorous, he enjoys playful banter and is passionate about gaming.
participant_1.background: i drive a ford pinto. i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit quirky, she has a vivid imagination and a nostalgic view of her younger days.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.

content.text: hello, how are you? I do not have any pets. do you like donuts?
I like them, but at my time of life it’s not a healthy food
I like healthy food. do you have a favorite band? mine is donuts
I have a healthy ford pinto. do you live on a weekends?
